title: Language filter will not disable during game
body:
I turned off the language filter and when I am pre game and chatting with friends its fine but when i get in the game all I see is *****

Anyone know what im missing? ive looked in the settings ingame and out of game I cant find anything that turns it off for ingame only. :

replies.body: if your on the new client the disable language filter seems to only work with out of game chat if you launch the legacy client and disable language filter in there it should save and you can hear... read all the swears you want again

Your toggle may be having an issue saving.  The following workaround was able to help some players, so let me know if it works for you:

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know!
Thank you so much works great!
